rules_text:
As long as you have 25 or more life, Alia's Enforcer gets +2/+2 and gains flying.
Whenever an artifact or enchantment you control enters, you gain 1 life.
flavor_text: [i]“When Miss Alia came to this plane, she asked me to stand against the Banished. With her radiance, I can do anything.”[/i]
